TopicTitle: Phantom II SSTO Ascent, Orbital Ops, and Landing

Articles.Content:
Introducing the Phantom II SSTO, the first fully authorized LKO SSTO from the Aurora Space Industries Corporation. It is capable of delivering light payloads into LKO with the ability to extend its range by mounting droptanks in the cargo bay.

The spacecraft handles well during ascent with a mysterious desire to slightly yaw left. Night operations is a breeze with the integrated lighting systems so you always know where you are. During this demonstration, a hotter than expected reentry was encountered which damaged the external lighting systems and emergency parachutes. No critical systems were damaged. The Phantom II works best with shallow reentry profiles so as to maintain handling and in turn increase landing precision.
